alert.note: Alert for Benton (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 09 at 11:33AM CDT until August 10 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arkansas, including the following counties, Benton, Carroll, Madison and Washington AR. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Additional thunderstorms are expected to develop along a frontal boundary this afternoon and evening with the potential to train over the same locations. This will create locally heavy rainfall with increasing potential for flash flood conditions. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
